feed.title: dev stuff
feed.subtitle: Made with Jekyll using a slightly modified version of the minima theme and hosted on github.io

entry.title: init post
entry.content: Finally got around to setting up a webpage for myself. If I decide I want to make some blog posts on technical topics I can do that here which is nice. Getting things set up with Jekyll using Github pages was a lot easier than I thought it was going to be and it looks pretty clean.
entry.summary: Finally got around to setting up a webpage for myself. If I decide I want to make some blog posts on technical topics I can do that here which is nice. Getting things set up with Jekyll using Github pages was a lot easier than I thought it was going to be and it looks pretty clean.
